Data Fields
vpsissRszInstConfig Struct Reference

Resizer instance configuration, there are two resizer instances RSA and RSB, both can be independently resize the input and provide independent output. This structure contains instance specific configuration like output dataformat, horizonta/vertical scaling factor etc. More...

#include <vps_cfgrsz.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t enable
 
Fvid2_Format outFmt
 
vpsissRszFlipCtrl_t flipCtrl

uint32_t vRatio
 

Detailed Description

Resizer instance configuration, there are two resizer instances RSA and RSB, both can be independently resize the input and provide independent output. This structure contains instance specific configuration like output dataformat, horizonta/vertical scaling factor etc.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissRszInstConfig::alpha

Alpha Value used for the ARGB output Format, only lsb 8bits are valid

uint32_t vpsissRszInstConfig::enable

Flag to indicate whether this instanc of the resizer is enabled or not TRUE, Instance is enabled and its configuration will be applied FALSE, instance is not enabled, configuration will not be applied

vpsissRszFiltConfig_t vpsissRszInstConfig::filtCfg

Structure containing Filter configuration for luma and chroma on horizontal and vertical side

vpsissRszFlipCtrl_t vpsissRszInstConfig::flipCtrl

Used to flip the output in horizontal and/or vertical direction

uint32_t vpsissRszInstConfig::hRatio

Horizontal Scaling ration, used only when overrideScaleFactor = TRUE

vpsissRszIntsConfig_t vpsissRszInstConfig::intensityCfg

Structure containing intensity configuration for luma and chroma on horizontal and vertical side

Fvid2_Format vpsissRszInstConfig::outFmt

Output Format from this Resizer instance, Only width/height and dataFormat variables are used, Resizer supports only below dataFormats FVID2_DF_BAYER_RAW, FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV, FVID2_DF_RGB16_565, FVID2_DF_ARGB32_8888

uint32_t vpsissRszInstConfig::overrideScaleFactor

Flag to use user provided scaling factor instead of calculating them

vpsissRszScaleMode_t vpsissRszInstConfig::scaleMode

Rescaled Mode, could be either Normal or Downscale mode

Fvid2_PosConfig vpsissRszInstConfig::startPos

Starting position of the Input image, this is in addition to the start position specified in the crop size

uint32_t vpsissRszInstConfig::vRatio

Vertical Scaling ration, used only when overrideScaleFactor = TRUE

vpsissRszYuvResizeMode_t vpsissRszInstConfig::yuvRszMode

Resizer mode for the YUV data, Used only when overrideInCfg flag of vpsissRszInputConfig_t is set. Used to select luma only, chroma only or both luma and chroma output.
